text.tspan: Fertility rates in the US and China

tspan.tspan: More worryingly, the two economic superpowers have
fallen below the 2.1 threshold that guarantees a stable
population. A shrinking population means an inverted
age structure in the upcoming decades. There will be less
working-age indiividuals to pay for pensions and
healthcare for an increasingly elderly population.China's
population, for instance, is projected to be smaller than
